Role(s) : Early Elementary Teacher (K-2nd);
LinkedIn Profile : I have alternate experience in both the career fields of Agriculture and Law Enforcement.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I hope participating in this externship will immerse me in both education and facilitation opportunities to broaden my knowledge spectrum of the STEM culture and to be able to integrate those valuable lessons into my home classroom in order to provide knowledge and enrichment for the students I serve.
